job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: At Actuate, we make the world safer by turning any camera into a smart camera.<br><br>Our AI software analyzes data from existing security cameras in real-time to detect weapons, intruders, social distancing masks, crowds, and where people travel in any environment. The system acts as an end-to-end security camera management system that enables onboarding and management of cameras as well as instant alerts and analytics that allow organizations to pinpoint problems.<br><br>We leverage cutting-edge computer vision algorithms for object detection on a hyper-scale cloud backend, and we provide analytics to our customers without collecting any personally identifiable information.<br><br>We're looking for an experienced engineer who wants to define our stack from the ground-up. The role will involve analyzing integration options into customers' existing video management systems and architecting hyperscale, cloud-based solutions to pull video and process while keeping bandwidth utilization extremely low. The ideal candidate will have experience working with both legacy, enterprise systems and cutting-edge cloud technology in Python, Java, and/or C#.<br><br>We're a Post-Series A company funded by Tribeca Venture Partners and Scribble VC, and we're looking for people who want to help grow the business quickly. If you want to help build a company from the ground up and develop cutting-edge technology to make the world a safer place--without invading privacy--we'd love to hear from you.<br><br><strong>For more information: <br><br></strong><strong>Requirements:<br></strong><ul><li>2+ years experience in software engineering</li><li>Bachelor's degree in computer science, computer engineering, or similar</li><li>Resident in the NYC metro area</li><li>US Citizen or Green Card Holder<br><br></li></ul><strong>Experience with the following is a plus:<br></strong><ul><li>Experience building cloud-hosted systems using Python, C# and/or Java in a startup or big tech environment</li><li>Experience with agile development methods</li><li>Advanced degree in computer science or similar<br><br></li></ul><strong>Location: </strong>New York City<br><br><em>Actuate (Aegis Systems Inc.) is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.<br><br></em>Powered by JazzHR<br><br>ovwHgLW7is
